lead_paragraph: BERNSTEIN--Joseph. The congregation of Westchester Reform Temple mourns the death of its longtime member and past president and extends sympathy to his bereaved family. Helene K. Gray, President Jonathan E. Blake, Rabbi Jill Abramson, Cantor 1/3
